Text: However, the increase in the price of gold and decrease in the price of copper since 1 January 2019 have resulted in one tonne of copper decreasing in value from approximately 4.7 to 3.8 GEOs, said non-executive chairman Khosrow Zamani.
Cause: However, the increase in the price of gold and decrease in the price of copper since 1 January 2019
Effect: one tonne of copper decreasing in value from approximately 4.7 to 3.8 GEOs, said non-executive chairman Khosrow Zamani.
Sentence: <e1>However, the increase in the price of gold and decrease in the price of copper since 1 January 2019</e1> have resulted in <e2>one tonne of copper decreasing in value from approximately 4.7 to 3.8 GEOs, said non-executive chairman Khosrow Zamani.</e2>
